info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 11:53PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORM WITH SMALL HAIL WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WESTERN SUFFOLK COUNTY THROUGH 1230 AM EDT... At 1152 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Smithtown, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This thunderstorm will be near... Hauppauge around 1200 AM EDT. Brentwood and Ronkonkoma around 1210 AM EDT. Islip and Bay Shore around 1230 AM EDT. Other locations that could be impacted by this storm include Islip Terrace, Brightwaters, and Central Islip. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
